name: Bring Revolution 60 to PC and Mac!
blurb: Revolution 60 is Heavy Rain meets Mass Effect with an all-girl cast, made with the Unreal engine. One choice changes everything.

rewards.reward: - Your support will help make REVOLUTION 60 a reality. You will be given a THANK YOU in the game credits!

CORE REWARD PACK, which includes:
1. If we reach our stretch goal of $10,000, you will receive a PC version of our game, scheduled for release August 2014! 
2. If we reach our stretch goal of $20,000, you will also receive a Mac version of the game, scheduled for release September 2014!
3. You will be given a THANK YOU in the game credits!

You will receive: 1. CORE REWARD PACK and 2. DIGITAL BONUS PACK, which includes: Revolution 60 digital wallpapers made by our award-winning artists, and a digital download of the song "Player Two Press Start", with vocals by Amanda Winn-Lee, specially recorded for the closing credits of the game!

You will receive the REVOLUTION 60: SPECIAL EDITION! This includes CORE REWARD PACK, DIGITAL BONUS PACK plus the Revolution 60 Strategy guide! This e-book contains advanced combat strategies, Holiday\u2019s advanced weapon pack, and special in-game items that will help you get the ending you want!

You will receive the REVOLUTION 60: SPECIAL EDITION, plus a physical copy of a limited edition Revolution 60 Poster! This movie-style poster has cast names and credits of the whole team, and will be signed by our team! (Only this reward level includes the poster!)

You will receive the REVOLUTION 60: SPECIAL EDITION, plus physical copies of each of TWO different limited edition Revolution 60 Posters! One will be the same poster as the $65 pledge level, plus a second unique poster.  Only this reward level includes both posters!
You will receive the CHESSBOARD OPERATIVE PACK! This includes the REVOLUTION 60 SPECIAL EDITION + a limited edition Revolution 60 T-shirt! We will have sizes for both men and women.
You will receive the CHESSBOARD OPERATIVE PACK + your name will appear TWICE in game. Once, as a name on a dedication plate in the N313 space station and in a SPECIAL THANKS section of the credits!
Become an evil corporation in the Rev 60 universe! Your name and fictional company logo will appear in the game on a crate in the Rev 60 shipping bay + you will receive the CHESSBOARD OPERATIVE PACK.

You will receive a special associate producer credit in the game! Plus, if you're ever in Boston, the Rev 60 team will take you out to lunch to say, "Thank you!" Plus, you will receive the CHESSBOARD OPERATIVE PACK!

Be an animator for a day!  We will host you or someone of your choosing at a site visit to our studio in Boston MA, where YOU will animate a sequence that will appear in the finished game.  PLUS you\u2019ll receive an \u201cAdditional animation by\u201d credit.  And we will take you out to a delicious meal and tell you everything you want to know about game development, life, the universe and everything!  (Travel and accommodations not included; must be able to travel to Boston MA.) Plus, you will receive the CHESSBOARD OPERATIVE PACK!

Receive a limited edition 3D print of HOLIDAY! This hand-painted, 10-inch figure will stand with the best of them! Here's the one we have at the Giant Spacekat Office! http://flic.kr/p/fiWk7X You will also receive everything in the CHESSBOARD OPERATIVE PACK!

Receive a limited edition 3D print of any Revolution 60 character in any pose you'd like! Our team will work with you to make a one-of-a-kind figure!  This hand-painted, 10-inch figure will stand with the best of them! Here's the one we have at the Giant Spacekat Office! http://flic.kr/p/fiWk7X You will also receive everything in the CHESSBOARD OPERATIVE PACK!

Anything is on the table. Want to design an enemy type? Want to have a cameo in the game? Would you like a line you wrote to appear in the game? We'll talk about it. Reward subject to creator approval, as it must fit the theme of the Rev 60 universe and not draw undue attention to itself.
